reference.title: Getting design doc information
reference.shortdesc: To retrieve a design document, use the GET /bucket/_design/[ddoc-name] HTTP method and URI on the 8092 port.

section.title: Description
section.p: To obtain an existing design document from a bucket, use the 8092 port and GET /bucket/_design/[ddoc-name] HTTP method URI ending with the design document name.
To retrieve all design documents in a cluster use the 8091 port with the /pools/default/buckets/[bucket-name]/ddocs URI.
